docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 29 In his final news conference as chairman of the Federal Trade Commission, Lewis A. Engman said today that there was far too much regulation by government at all levels.

headline.main: F.T.C. Chief Has Final Word: Government Is Overregulating

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 29 In his final news conference as chairman of the Federal Trade Commission, Lewis A. Engman said today that there was far too much regulation by government at all levels.

byline.original: By HAROLD M. SCHNECK Jr. Special to The New York Times
